statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -5 \\ 8 \\ 5 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ 19 \\ -28 \\ -19 \\ -28 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
